feed.title: New BIP: protocol for multisignature payments

entry.title: New BIP: protocol for multisignature payments
entry.summary: In a discussion between Gavin Andresen and Mike Hearn, the former stated that standards should be descriptive rather than proscriptive. He also suggested pairing protocol specifications with implementations. Meanwhile, Hearn sought feedback from the community about a potential implementation but did not give any concrete plans for it.
